definition: an award for winning a championship or commemorating some other event
details:
noun
- an award for winning a championship or commemorating some other event
= example: an award for winning a championship or commemorating some other event
= synonyms: decoration
- an emblem indicating that a taxicab is registered
- a circular helping of food, especially a boneless cut of meat
= example: a circular helping of food, especially a boneless cut of meat
- any of various large ancient Greek coins
= example: any of various large ancient Greek coins
